name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space
name_original: Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space
description:
Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space is an action game.
You can play Mobile Suit Gundam: Encounters in Space on PlayStation 2.
Koji Yamada, Tadayoshi Makino, Takanori Arima and Yasuharu Takanashi scored the game.
